member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToMd5Hash(System.String)
member.summary: Calculates MD5 hash for a given string
member.param: The string to generate hash for
member.example:
This sample shows call to call the method
string hash = "Hello World!.ToMd5Hash();

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToBoolean(System.String)
member.summary: Converts a string value to a boolean value
member.example:
This sample shows call to call the method
bool isFemale = "true".ToBoolean();

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToShort(System.String)
member.summary: Parses a short value from a string
member.example:
This sample shows call to call the method
short days = "365".ToShort();

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToInteger(System.String)
member.summary: Parses a integer value from a string
member.example:
This sample shows call to call the method
int peopleCount = "1234567".ToInteger();

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToLong(System.String)
member.summary: Parse long value from a string
member.example:
This sample shows call to call the method
long totalWeightInGrams = "3498725178".ToLong();

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToDateTime(System.String)
member.summary: Convert a string to a DateTime
member.example:
This sample shows call to call the method
DateTime birthDay = "12.04.2013 г.".ToDateTime();

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.CapitalizeFirstLetter(System.String)
member.summary: Makes the first letter of a strign in CAPITAL_CASE
member.returns: The same string, but with capitalized first letter
member.example:
This sample shows call to call the method
string name = "pesho".CapitalizeFirstLetter();

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.GetStringBetween(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Return a strign that is placed between two other strings
member.param: The string to start extracting from
Index to start searching from (default is 0)
member.returns: The string that is between the start and end strings, and is after the index
member.example:
This sample shows call to call the method
string anchorContent = "Hello".GetStringBetween("", "");

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ConvertCyrillicToLatinLetters(System.String)
member.summary: Converts all cyrilic characters in a string to latin characters
member.returns: A string with all cyrilic characters replaced with latin letters
member.example:
This sample shows call to call the method
string latin = "Иванчо и Марийка отишли на училище".ConvertCyrilicToLatinLetters();

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ConvertLatinToCyrillicKeyboard(System.String)
member.summary: Converts all latin characters in a string to cyrilic characters
member.returns: A string with all latin characters replaced with cyrilic letters
member.example:
This sample shows call to call the method
string cyrilic = "Baj Pesho".ConvertLatinTOCyrilicKeyboard();

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToValidUsername(System.String)
member.summary: Converts a string to a valid username
member.returns: A string that is a valid username
member.example:
This sample shows call to call the method
string username = "bai pesho-95".ToValidUsername();

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToValidLatinFileName(System.String)
member.summary: Convers a string to a valid file name
member.returns: A string that is a valid file name
member.example:
This sample shows call to call the method
string fileName = "What is this?_?.html".ToValidLatinFileName();

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.GetFirstCharacters(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets the first cahrsCount characters from a string
member.param: The string to get characters from
member.returns: The first charsCount characters as a string
member.example:
This sample shows call to call the method
string beginning = "Hello World!".GetFirstCharacters(5);

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.GetFileExtension(System.String)
member.summary: Extracts the extension from a file name
member.example:
This sample shows call to call the method
string extension = "file.html".GetFileExtension();

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToContentType(System.String)
member.summary: Return the content type of a file based on the extension
member.returns: The content type of the file

This sample shows call to call the method

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToByteArray(System.String)
member.summary: Convert a string to a byte array
